subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: With opportune scoring and record-setting goaltending, the Boston Bruins won the Stanley Cup with a 4-0 victory over the Vancouver Canucks in Game 7 of the National Hockey League finals.
snippet: With opportune scoring and record-setting goaltending, the Boston Bruins won the Stanley Cup with a 4-0 victory over the Vancouver Canucks in Game 7 of the National Hockey League finals.
